description: Main Activity class for an Android TV application, extending FragmentActivity to handle TV remote key events and UI initialization.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Android TV frontend, managing UI setup and remote control input handling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and updates the title TextView.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles remote control key events such as ENTER, BACK, and D-PAD center.
